mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.perms is not null and m.perms!='' and m.status=1
SELECT b.id,b.name,b.parent_id FROM sys_role_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b on a.menu_id = b.id WHERE a.role_id = #{roleId} and b.status=1

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.name, m.description, m.url, m.parent_id, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and m.type in(0,1) and m.status=1 ORDER BY m.order_num
